description:
Welcome to the fascinating world of body language!

Me and my colleague Alina will offer you the keys you need to descipher the secrets, not only of body gestures in general, but our focus will be on one special section: women`s body language.

This course will provide you examples of such gestures and poses, and their meanings, through some very fun photos, and a bonus of 20 fun facts about body language in general.

At the end of the course you will be able to better understand and interpret the gestures or postures that women have during a conversation, but most importantly, knowing what their body language trully means, you will be able to adapt your own behavior to theirs and act accordingly, ending the conversation, getting it on the right track or continuing it if the signs tell you that you are doing it right.

Knowing to interpret a woman`s body language is like listening to her talk, on 2 levels: listening to what she is saying and observing through her body language what she really feels or wants to say.
title: Women Body Language - The Hidden Messages
